articles.title: IDFC First Bank enters credit card business with lowest finance charges of 9% on revolving credit - Times Now
articles.description: The private sector lender will also not charge interest on cash withdrawals from ATM during the 45-day free credit period. But cardholders will have to pay a nominal fee of Rs 250 per cash withdrawal.

articles.title: Aston Martin DBX Launched In India; Priced At Rs. 3.82 Crore - carandbike
articles.description: The Aston martin DBX is essentially an uber premium lifestyle crossover rather than a true blue SUV, but has got enough capability and elements to take some challenging terrains and beaten surfaces in its stride.
